import React from 'react'; export const Standings = (): JSX.Element => { const teams = [ { name: "Pat & Beav", rd1: 46, rd2: 0, rd3: 0, rd4: 0, total: 46, }, { name: "Seth & Souhail", rd1: 0, rd2: 0, rd3: 0, rd4: 0, total: 0, }, { name: "Sean & Alex", rd1: 0, rd2: 0, rd3: 0, rd4: 0, total: 0, }, { name: "Ben & Joe", rd1: 39, rd2: 0, rd3: 0, rd4: 0, total: 39, }, { name: "Drew & Lyndsie", rd1: 0, rd2: 0, rd3: 0, rd4: 0, total: 0, }, { name: "Eric & Rourke", rd1: 0, rd2: 0, rd3: 0, rd4: 0, total: 0, }, { name: "Dustin & Geo", rd1: 40, rd2: 0, rd3: 0, rd4: 0, total: 40, }, { name: "JL3 & Ryan", rd1: 41, rd2: 0, rd3: 0, rd4: 0, total: 41, } ] const createStandings = teams .sort((a, b) => a.total > b.total ? 1 : -1 ) .map(row => { return(
{row.name}
{row.total}
{row.rd1}
{row.rd2}
{row.rd3}
{row.rd4}
) }) return (
{createStandings}
Team Average RD1 RD2 RD3 RD4
); }
